name: MoneyFellows
description: MoneyFellows is a collaborative Group Lending and Savings Platform. It is a trusted and more convenient way of finding and managing Money Circles online, by digitizing the traditional, informal offline ROSCA (Rotating Savings and Credit Association) Model, allowing users to meet their financial and saving needs. ROSCAs are found in over 90 countries worldwide, with a variety of names, such as 'Gam‚Äôeya' in the Arab World, 'Chit Funds' in India, 'Tandas' in Mexico and 'Committees' in Pakistan. MoneyFellows combines Saving and Credit by establishing Money Circles for users to participate in: 1 - Based on a user‚Äôs MoneyFellows Credit Score they can search and find a suitable Money Circle to join. 2 - The Money Circle begins and all users pay a matching monthly installment, for a pre-defined number of months, placed in a common pot. 3 - Each month, one member receives the total money in the common pot, until all members have received their Payout once, ending the Money Circle. For thousands of years, people have participated in offline Money Circles in the same way, facing a great number of difficulties and limitations. MoneyFellows digitizes the ROSCA model, making it more convenient, secure, manageable and automated. Users can always find available Money Circles without being limited to their social network or geographic location and with a much larger variety of Payout dates and amounts. MoneyFellows users can benefit from some of the following features: - Flexible payment options (Credit Card‚Äì Salary Deduction ‚Äì Direct Debit ‚Äì Fawry Payments ‚Äì Cash Collection). - Guaranteed Payout dates and amounts. - Secure Money Circles, users always receive 100% of their Payout, even if other members of the circle are late or miss payments. - Smart Credit Scoring System, where users continuously build up their score to unlock higher Payouts. - A variety of benefits for employees of our corporate partners. Download the MoneyFellows app and try it out now!

name: Wrike
description:
Wrike is the most powerful work management platform. Built for teams and organizations looking to collaborate, create, and exceed every day, Wrike brings everyone and all work into a single place to remove complexity, increase productivity, and free people up to focus on their most purposeful work.

What Is Wrike?
Wrike is an enterprise-ready, cloud-based collaborative work management platform for managing cross-functional work at scale that is fully configurable and enables contextual collaboration in a secure environment. Enterprises use Wrike to offer a single digital workplace for all of their departments and teams.

The Wrike platform has the power needed to support the most complex workflows, all managed through an intuitive and easy-to-use and adopt interface. The Wrike platform can be customized to any user, team, department, or project so your teams can make requests, plan projects, assign tasks, collaborate with team members, track progress on work, and more.

Wrike tracks the analytics you need to make the data-driven decisions that generate higher ROI. Wrike integrates with your technology stack and connects effort to business results without having to pull data from multiple systems. Wrike also offers specialized solutions for marketing and professional services teams and service organizations like agencies and consulting firms.
